title: Immediate addresse vnto God alone First deliuered in a sermon before his Maiestie at Windsore. Since reuised and inlarged to a just treatise of inuocation of saints. Occasioned by a false imputation of M. Antonius De Dominis vpon the authour, Richard Montagu.
author: Montagu, Richard, 1577-1641.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Matthew Lownes and William Barret,
